hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the directory name in HarvesterDistribution into which the build will be copied

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_BRANCH_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the branch name that needs to be built

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify a name for the build. No special char allowed. Use underscore for meaningful names

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
#Commonly used varaibles export WIN_VECTORCAST_DIR="H:\\VCAST_REGRESSION\\windows" export LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR="/home/vectorindia/VCAST_REGRESSION/linux" export LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR_WIN_PATH="H:\\VCAST_REGRESSION\\linux" export WIN_VECTORCAST_BUILD="B:\VectorCAST\vc64\windows\install.tar.gz" export LINUX_VECTORCAST_BUILD="B:\VectorCAST\vc64\linux\release.tar.gz" export LINUX_RELEASE_DIR=/home/vectorindia/HarvesterDistribution/${RELEASE_DIR} export WIN_RELEASE_DIR=H:\\HarvesterDistribution\\${RELEASE_DIR} export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=7650@licenseserver export LINUX_PACKAGE=harvester.linux.tgz export WIN_PACKAGE=harvester.win.zip export WIN_BOOST_DIR=C:\\boost\\boost-1.53.0 export WIN_BOOST64_DIR=C:\\boost\\boost-1.53.0-x64 export CYG_BOOST_DIR=/cygdrive/c/boost/boost_cyg_1_54 export BOOST_VER=1_53
#if the release directory already exists delete it if [ -d "${LINUX_RELEASE_DIR}" ];then rm -rf "${LINUX_RELEASE_DIR}" fi
#Create the release directory mkdir "${LINUX_RELEASE_DIR}"
